sourcesContent:
// default options


const colors = {
    hdi_category: {
        'very-high': '#D8EF8B', 
        'high': '#FDE08B', 
        'medium': '#FB8D59', 
        'low': '#D63127'
    },
    inform_severity: {
        'very-high': '#D63127', 
        'high': '#FB8D59', 
        'medium': '#FDE08B', 
        'low': '#D8EF8B', 
        'no-score': '#DAE0EA', 
    },
    blue: '#1F558C',
    lightblue: '#62D7F7',
    lightnavy: '#799EAD',
    red: '#E02225',
    green: '#D8EF8B',
    ifrcgreen: '#87C400',
    black: '#595454',
    lightgrey: '#e8e8e8',
    darkgrey: '#c1c1c1',
    white: '#fff',
    olive: '#87C400',
    purple: '#771966',
    orange: '#FF3500',
    pink: '#FB0080'
}

// option 1
var c = ['#00ADED','#003A5A','#62D7F7','#799EAD','#BCCED6']
// option 2
var c = ['#00ADED','#003A5A','#62D7F7','#799EAD','#FFDD00']
// option 3
var c = ['#00529A','#003A5A','#62D7F7','#799EAD','#FFDD00']

colors.regions = {
        'AP': colors.orange, 
        'AM': colors.lightblue, 
        'EU': colors.ifrcgreen, 
        'ME': '#0A3248', 
        'AF': '#FCD204', 
    }


    colors.regions = {
        'AP': c[0], 
        'AM': c[1], 
        'EU': c[2], 
        'ME': c[3], 
        'AF': c[4], 
    }





export default colors;
